_header: Rutterkin is come unto our town
Note: Cf. Speech of Abusione in Magnificence (391), Stage 2, scene 12
_description: A satire on gallants, perhaps by John Skelton — four quatrains and burden: ‘Hoyda, hoyda jolly rutterkin’
